abstract: An undergraduate reflects on the dilemma prospective students face over parties where alcohol is present when visiting a college campus.
snippet: An undergraduate reflects on the dilemma prospective students face over parties where alcohol is present when visiting a college campus.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Griffee, a sophomore at New York University pursuing a double major in journalism and politics, is an intern this fall on The Choice blog.

headline.main: When the College Tour Takes a Detour to a Keg Party
